reviews.review: Hayatımda Arkadaşımla eğlenebilceğim küfürleşebilceğim bu kadar kötü ama harikulade zor ve mükemmel bi oyun oynadım ama buda mükemmel en sevdiğim oyunlar sıralamasına girermi diye sorcak olursanız sormayın aq
Это ШЕДЕВР ребят, в мультиплеере очень прикольно, да и цена не кусается
Muy buen juego, me hace soñar con que pudiera cruzar un portal que me saque de latinoamerica.
I bought this game to play co-op with my nephew. The co-op is very short
两部曲真的是一口气通关的，堪称完美的解谜大作，硬说一个遗憾的话，那就是为什么没有3了！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！

怎么说呢，这游戏偶尔烧脑，偶尔有点小恐怖，有点小操作，剧情贼棒，没玩过一代应该也不怎么有影响，单人通关需要点点游戏基础哈~
联机相对来说我感觉更难，地图变大了，大部分需要双人合作才可以通关，怎么说呢，交流起来不是心有灵犀，真的会通关困难，但这也确实可以练默契，hhh 
创意工坊的图更难，妈耶，图做的太牛掰了

The immersive story keeps the player to continue playing and problem solving. It also wraps up the series very nicely, with its almost unseen ending. Along with all this, the wonderful sound design helps fit with the atmosphere.

very good good epic
hahahahahahahahhahahahahahahahah so epic

fantastic game, if I could experience it as a beginner again I would. The puzzles and story are both very engaging, and I adore the subtle pointers that hint we're in the half life universe.
Ainda não joguei muito mas parece bem interessante pra jogar coop

It's a very fun game with puzzles that require some thinking through. It's also very story-rich, which keeps it interesting. I am surprised by the amount of levels, there's a lot!
I definitely like the co-op levels, it's only a little bit dissapointing you cant filter search for an online companion. Communication is the key, but I had to play with a lot of foreign people, little kids and people without a mic or portal experience.

Portal 2...En sevdiğim oyun.Bana şaheser gibi geliyor bu oyun ya.Niye mi bu kadar abartıyorum?Belki hayatımda pc den oynadığım ilk fps oyunu diyedir,belki bilgisayarım kötü olduğu için pek fazla fps oyunu oynayamadığım için oynadığım sayılı oyunlardan en beğendiğim oyun olduğu için midir, belki gerçekten mükemmel ötesi bir oyun mudur bilemem ona siz karar verin. Ben sadece o ağustos ayında odamı kapkaranlık yapıp led ışıklarımı açıp 11,6 inçlik küçücük ekranımdan oynadığım ve hayatımın en keyifli zamanlarımı geçirdiğim kısmı çok sevdim.Wheatleyin ve Gladosun şakalarının verdiği eğlence şimdi tekrar oynayınca hala güzel.Bunun dışında hikayeli oyun belki 3 oyun falan oynamışımdır.Fakat çoğu oyunun videosunu izledim.Hala en beğendiğim bu.Ve artık her sene oynama kararı aldım bu oyunu.Yani sen hala bu oyunu alsam mı almasam mı diye düşünüyosun ayıp ediyosun :)
Fajna gra, ale mam błąd z niewidzialną ścianą
Купил не так давно но игра стоит того.
Jogo muito bom. Tem uma boa história e adicionou um modo coop que é muito legal e divertido.

This is definitely a brain stimulating game.  I really enjoyed that the controls are simple yet effective. The freedom to solve the puzzles is quite challenging at times. I sometimes had to take a few minutes just to look around and see what options I had. Would definitely recommend!

Secuela del primer Portal en el que Valve pone toda la carne en el asador para darnos una segunda parte espectacular.

En el primero, todo era más sencillo y directo, aquí, no hay una sola habitación en la que no haya un script o algún evento para llamarnos la atención. Los puzzles son más complejos debido a que se introducen nuevos materiales y superficies para hacer pruebas más elaboradas.

A nivel de historia, profundizan muchísimo lo que empezó en el primer juego y se añaden nuevos personajes que hacen que el universo Portal se vuelva más rico y conozcamos mejor todo junto con ciertas conexiones con Half-Life y los laboratorios de Blackmesa.

Es un juego totalmente imprescindible una vez ya te has pasado la primera parte. Es cierto que el hecho de que sea más largo y a veces más complejo hace que algunos valoren más la primera entrega, pero es innegable que lo que han añadido y mejorado merece siempre la pena.
Меня тут просят описать что понравилось... ВСЕ
It is way better than portal 1 but both are so great and innovative with a great story too

this game and its predecessor are perfect examples of how valve always manages to take video games to the next level. dont get me wrong, this game has its flaws, but they are few and far between. the graphics from a 9 year old game still hold up today. the game play has all very unique and a few rather difficult puzzles. the comedy is good, not the best, but will still make you laugh. most of the jokes are semi-dark humor. the story is believeable and decently fleshed out. most questions can be answered if you pay enough attention. all around, 9/10, a damn near perfect game. once i started playing i did not stop till i had finished the single player play through. thats the one problem with this game, i cant really play it again. until i find a friend for co-op mode atleast.
50000 years after portal 1 and half life 2 you awoken again to do testing
very fun if you are here for story you came to the right place but not only that but its fun with friends.
you will get quickly addicted and you will end up loving the story.
Absolutely love this game. So amusing and funny!

Портал, атмосфернее кооп игры для души я не встречал! Эта игра сплотила моего друга и меня, она подарила нам незабываемые воспоминания и огромную долю веселья. Купили мы ее спонтанно и ни капли не пожалели! Я не забуду эту игру и воспоминания подаренные часами в ней, ведь не каждая головоломка может довести от ярости до веселья и даже безумия. Чего только стоят приколы придуманные в процессе прохождения. Я советую к прохождению эту игру каждому игроку( даже независимо от того любите вы головоломки или же нет). Приятной игры и веселья!
Однозначно да! Пройти хотя бы онлайн режим должен каждый!!! Незабываемые эмоции!!!
i recommend this game is a 10/10 its an awesome game i love it buy it its worth it
Una obra maestra hecha realidad. super recomendad 10/10 deberia ser obligación jugar este joyita.
